name: hapray-staticanalyzer
description: Static analyzer for HAP packages - analyzing SO files and resources

scripts.demo: npm run build && node lib/cli.js -i test-app.hap -o demo-output -f json -v
scripts.demo:html: npm run build && node lib/cli.js -i test-app.hap -o demo-output -f html -v
scripts.demo:excel: npm run build && node lib/cli.js -i test-app.hap -o demo-output -f excel -v
scripts.demo:all: npm run build && npx ts-node demo/output-formats-demo.ts
